articles.title: South Africa police fire rubber bullets at anti-migrant protesters - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: South African police fired rubber bullets and stun grenades Sunday at a protest in Johannesburg against migrant workers that drew some 200 people, many of them unemployed.
